content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Mr. Rahman. I am open to discussing the rental price. What would you consider a fair price for the space?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Well, considering the size of the apartment and the location, I would say that a fair price would be around $1,200 per month. Is that something you could work with?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: I appreciate your offer, Mr. Rahman. However, I'm looking to rent out the apartment for a bit more than what you've proposed. Would you be willing to negotiate further?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Certainly, Mister Heine. I understand that you might have a different price in mind. How much more are you looking to rent it for?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: I was hoping to secure a monthly rental price of $1,500. This would reflect the prime location and the demand for apartments in this area. Is this something you would consider?
name: Heinrich Heine
